320927.「ネーしゃまーっ！\n さっそく みんなで 会いにきたよー！: Zennyyyyy! We came right away to see you!

320928.「ええ……父 主神グランゼニスを\n 目覚めさせる方法に 思い至ったため\n あ:
Yes...I called the Children of the Covenant
here because I have come up with a way to
awaken my father, Gran Zenith.

320929.「眠ってる パパゼニスさまが 目を覚ましたら\n 創失の呪いだって なんとかでき:
If that sleepy Papa Zenith wakes up, then
maybe we can finally do something about
that awful curse! ...Right, Zenny?

320931.「……あ あのっ！ 今のは その……。\n 先日 すてきな 呼び名を いただいた:
Oh, well, um... That was... You gave me such
a wonderful nickname before, and I just
wanted to...return the favor, is all...

320932.「すこしばかり 馴れ馴れしかったです……よね。\n ご不快でしょうから やはり:
I overstepped there, I think... You must be
awfully uncomfortable right now, so I will
continue to call you Porte as before...

320933.「ううん！ すっごく うれしいよ。\n ありがとね ネーしゃまっ！:
Uh uh! I'm so happy! Thanks so much,
Zenny!

320934.「よろしいのですかっ！？\n ……ですが さきほどの みなさまの反応を\n かん:
Are you certain!? Considering everyone's
reaction just now, it seems "Porpie" is a
bit, well...

320935.「ポルぽよ……いえ ポルてむ……ポルリーノ\n ……違う こんなのじゃダメ。もっ:
Porpo... No, Porto... Poreen...
No, that's no good... I need something much,
much better to express this loveliness...

320939.「いーじゃん ポルるん！\n あたし すっごく 気に入っちゃった♪:
Porrie is sooo good!
I love it so much! ♪

320941.「さて……我が父たる 主神グランゼニスは\n 創生のチカラにて ゼニアスを 創造:
Now, then... Gran Zenithーusing the power of
creationーcreated Zeniath and its protectors,
the Guardian Angels.

320942.「守護天使たちに注がれた 創生のチカラは\n 比類なく 強大なもの。彼らが集えば:
The power of creation bestowed upon the
Guardian Angels is without compare. If they
gather, they may be able to awaken him.

320943.「あの時 ポルるん……\n ルティアナの被造物たる 誓約の子らを\n 感じ取り:
At that moment, Porrie... It was if he sensed
you and called out to Lutiana's creations,
the Children of the Covenant...

320944.「女神ゼネシアさま。\n その 守護天使たちは 今 どこに？:
Zenethia... Where are these Guardian Angels
now?

320945.「この考えに至りしとき わたくしは みずから\n ゼニアス中に 呼びかけてみまし:
When I thought of this idea, I called out to
all the beings of Zeniath. But not a single
one responded...

320946.「ですが かすかな気配は 感じます。\n おそらく ジア・クトとの戦いで 傷つき:
However, I do sense a faint presence. Perhaps
the battle with the Dia Kut has left them
wounded and unable to respond.

320947.「ネーしゃま！ メレちー！\n 前から 気になってたんだけど\n あそこに ある:
Hey, Zenny! I always wondered about that
statue over there. It looks kinda like a
Guardian Angel, doesn't it?

320948.「う～ん……遠くて よく見えないよー。\n 向こう岸へ渡る橋は 落ちちゃってるし:
Hmmm...it's too far away to get a good look.
I am curious about it, but the bridge to the
other side is broken...

320949.「ゼニスの封宮の時みたいに\n <pc>の 聖天のつばさで\n 空を飛べたら い:
It would be nice if we could fly on the
Wonderwing with you, just like we did inside
the palace...

320950.「まあ……。アストルティアには 神気を\n 飛行のチカラに変える道具が あるので:
I see...so Astoltia has ways to convert divine
energy into the power of flight, does it?
...Please wait for just a moment.

320951.「これで わたくしの神気が ゼニアスの地を\n 満たしました。守護天使たちを 捜:
Now that my divine energy has filled this
land, I am sure it will help you in your
search for the Guardian Angels...

320953.「……申し訳…ありません。ポルるん……。\n どうやら……少しばかり……\n チ:
I'm...sorry, Porrie...
It appears I've used...a little too much of
my power...

320955.「ネーしゃま つらそうだったね。\n 聖天のつばさを 使えるようにするために\n:
It must've been really hard on you...
Using all that energy to get the Wonderwing
working here...

320956.「しばらく休めば 回復するって言葉を 信じて\n 私たちに できることを やるし:
We'll just have to take her word about
recovering and do what we can.

320957.「そーだね。パパゼニスさまが\n 目を覚ましたら きっと 創失の呪いだって\n:
You're right! When Papa Zenith wakes up, I'm
sure he'll do something about the curse!

320958.「手がかりは ウォルドの守護天使像ね。\n さっそく 聖天のつばさで 向こう岸に:
Our clue is that Guardian Angel statue near
the falls. Let's use the Wonderwing to cross
the river!

320959.「よーし <pc>隊長\n ばんばん 守護天使たちを 見つけちゃおう！:
O-kay, captain!
Let's find those Guardian Angels!

320960.ゼニアスでも 霊子の見える場所なら\n聖天のつばさで 空を飛べるようになった。\:
Now you can fly in Zeniath wherever you see
spirit specks! Go and check the Guardian
Angel statue in Angelfall.<me 71>

320961.「こちらが 各地の守護天使たちを 見つけた際に\n 預かったという ３つの品です:
So these are the three items given to you
when you found each respective Guardian
Angel?

320962.「弓と 弦と 矢……。\n ずいぶん古めかしいものの ようですが\n はてさて:
A bow, a string, and an arrow...
They look pretty old, so I'm not sure what
exactly we should do with them...

320963.「弓と弦と矢ってんなら 答えは決まってるさ。: I think the answer's pretty obvious.

320964.「……ここは 俺に まかせな。\n 手先の器用さにゃあ\n ちょいとばかり 自信:
Leave this one to me.
I've got a bit of confidence in my
handiwork.

320966.ナブレット団長の手によって 大樹の弓\n女神の弦 星封の矢の ３つの神器は\nゆ:
By Nablette's dexterous hands, the Oaken Bow,
Goddess String, and Benevarrow came together
to form the Bow of the Cradle!<me 72>

320968.「さっすが ナブおじさん！\n でも この弓を 何に使うんだろうね？:
Never doubted you for a second!
But...what do we use the bow for?

320969.「みんなが 守護天使を捜してる間に 調べたの。\n この はじまりの地の湖にある:
While you all were searching for the Guardian Angels, I did some research. That islet there, in the lake...doesn't that look like the Eye
of the Lake?

320970.「たしかに あの小島ならば 湖の目と呼ぶに\n 相応しいけど……とすると 守護天:
Indeed, it would be fitting if that islet was
called that, but...in that case, I don't
think it'll be so easy to meet with Magiel.

320971.「この湖一帯は 聖なる結界で 守られている。\n 何らかの資格を有する者か 定め:
That part of the lake is protected by some sacred ward. One must possess some kind of qualifications or use a special method
to even get close, I suppose.

320972.「ふむ……困りましたね。\n これから どうしたら……:
Hmm...that is a problem.
What should we do...?

320974.<center>３人の守護天使に 認められし\n誓約の子らよ……:
Children of the Covenant...
Recognized by the three Guardian
Angels...

320975.<center>我が名は ウォルドの守護天使\nマギエル:
My name is Magiel.
I am the Guardian Angel of Angelfall.

320976.<center>ゆりかごの弓を 手に取り\n湖に浮かぶ小島へ 矢を放て\nさすれ:
Take the Bow of the Cradle into your hand.
Shoot the arrow towards the lake's islet,
and you shall be shown the way...

320977.「今の声……ウォルドの天使像の\n るすばんメッセージと 同じ声だよ！\n メレ:
That voice just now...that was the same
voice from the message at that angel
statue!

320978.「<pc>隊長！\n この大役は 隊長に まかせたよ！:
Captain!
I leave this important task to you!

320979.ゆりかごの弓で 湖の小島へ \n矢を 放ってみますか？<yesno><close:
Shoot an arrow from the Bow of the Cradle
towards the islet?<yesno><close>

320980.「んも～！ もったいつけないで！\n ほらほらっ <pc>隊長っ。\n 最後の守:
Aww, come on! Don't be like that!
Come on, <pc>! We have to
go meet the last Guardian Angel!

320981.<pc>は 湖の小島へ 矢を放った！:
<pc> fires an arrow towards the
islet!

320982.ゆりかごの弓は はじけ飛び\n湖の小島まで 光の橋が かかった！:
The Benevarrow bursts forth, creating a bridge
of light that stretches to the islet!

320985.「……湖上に浮かぶ島は 聖なる地。\n 選ばれし者以外 決して立ち入らせるなと\:
The island on the lake is a sacred place.
Father has strictly commanded that only those
chosen are allowed to enter.

320986.「その聖なる地に おまえたち……何をした！: What have you done to this sacred place...?!

320987.「だから あたしたちが 選ばれし者なんだよ。\n ほら その光る橋を 見て！\n:
It's because we're the chosen ones! Just
look at that shiny bridge! Doesn't it just
scream "welcome!" to you?

320988.「ねえ ラキ。あの小島のことが 気になるなら\n お目付役として あなたが\n:
Hey, Raki... If you care so much about that
islet, then maybe you can accompany us?

320990.「では <pc>隊長 ポルテ君\n メレアーデ王女と そのお目付役 ラキ君。:
So, <pc>, Porte, Princess
Mereade...and Raki, who will keep watch.

320991.「湖の小島の調査 および\n ウォルドの守護天使 マギエル捜索は\n みなさんに:
The investigation of the islet and the search
for Magiel, I leave to you!

320994.「そう。女神ルティアナさまは\n ゼネシアねえさまの 妹君で……\n ラキの ち:
Yes. Lutiana is Zenethia's sister...Raki's
younger sister.

320995.「女神ルティアナさまも\n ネーしゃまも いかにも 女神さま～って\n 神々しい:
Lutiana and Zenny really give off that "look,
I'm a goddess!" vibe, don't you think?

320999.「女神ルティアナさま……？\n すでに 亡くなられたのでは……。:
Lutiana...? I thought she had already passed
away...

321003.「るすばんメッセージを 考えたときは\n あたしたち調査隊が こんなに デキるヤ:
When she first recorded that message, I guess
she didn't realize just how talented our
exploration team would be, huh?

321004.「ふっふっふ……ルティアナさま。\n とっくに ジア・クトは いなくなったし\n:
Hmm hmm hmm...! Oh, Lutiana. The Dia Kut are
long gone, and Zenny was saved by
our Captain <pc>!

321005.「もしかして 他の像にも\n 私たちへの伝言が 遺されているのかしら？:
Maybe the other statues have messages for us
too?

321006.「だよね メレちー！\n さっそく 他の像も 調べてみよう！:
You're probably right! Let's check them out
right away!

321007.<pc>たちは 広場に置かれた\n神々の像を くわしく調べ 呼びかけてみたが\n:
<pc> and co. examine the other
statues and call out to them, but none
of them respond...

321008.「ネーしゃまってば 何度 話しかけても\n ぜんぜん 返事してくれないよ！\n:
Zenny won't respond to me no matter how many
times I call out to her! I thought Zenny and
Porrie were supposed to be good friends...

321009.「……ねえさまに 用があるなら\n 本物と 話せばいい。:
If you want to talk to her, then you should
talk to the real one.

321011.「……てことで！\n 目指すは あの神殿だね！:
So...over there! We gotta get to that temple,
right?

321012.「女神ルティアナさまが 言うとおり\n てっぺんにある 神殿まで\n 守護天使マ:
We should do what Lutiana says, and meet
Magiel at the top of the temple!

321014.「いや～っ 遠路はるばる ご苦労さん！\n あんの ヘンクツじいさんの 無茶振り:
Whew...! I appreciate your effort in traveling so far! Responding to the demands of that strange old man...you've done well!
Splendid! Just splendid!

321015.「ん？ ルティアナちゃんの かわいいお姿が\n 見えねえようだが\n アンタらと:
Hmm? I don't see that cutie little Lutiana
with you. Didn't you all come together?

321016.「……いいぜ。言われなくても 感じるサ。\n あれから ずいぶん 経ったもんなあ:
...It's fine. I can feel it without you sayin'
anything. It's been quite awhile since then...
I'm just glad at least her kin came back safe.

321017.「我こそは ウォルドの守護天使 マギエル！\n 誓約の子ご一行様！\n アンタら:
I am Magiel, Guardian Angel of Angelfall!
Esteemed Children of the Covenant!
I welcome you with open arms!

321018.「ええっ……マギエルぅ！？\n だって おじさん……\n パパゼニスさま そっく:
Wha... Magiel?!? But, you...
You look just like Papa Zenith!

321019.「そうとも 誓約の子らよ！: Yes indeed! Children of the Covenant!

321020.「かつて ジア・レド・ゲノス率いる侵略者……\n ジア・クト念晶体との戦いに 終:
To put an end to the war against the Dia Kut
Telecrystal, led by Dia Ledo Genos...
Gran Zenith unleashed the curse of unmaking!

321021.「……ジア・クト去りし後\n かの おそるべき呪いが 我が身を蝕み\n いずれ:
After the Dia Kut's demise, that terrible
curse began to consume me. I knew I'd
eventually lose my sanity...

321022.「そこで！ あのじいさん 自分を封印する前に\n 自分の記憶と意志を オレに 受:
So! Before sealin' himself away, the old man
entrusted his will and his memories with me,
instructin' me to wait for sweet Lutiana...

321023.「それ以来 オレは 昔のイケてる姿とは\n 似ても 似つかねえ 主神そっくりの\:
Since then, I look nothing like my cool, handsome self anymore! Rather, I've become this rough, old man who looks
a lot like the Almighty!

321024.「ねえ マギちん！\n なんで この神殿に 隠れてたの？\n 守護天使３人 見つ:
Hey, Maggie. Why were you hiding in this
temple, anyway? It was really hard to find
those Guardian Angels, you know!

321025.「ジア・クト念晶体との戦いから\n 身を守るため……ですか？:
Was it...to protect yourself from the Dia
Kut Telecrystal?

321026.「ま そいつも 理由のひとつにゃ\n ちがいねぇ……かナ～？: Well... I suppose that's ONE reason...

321027.「で？ どうだい あのじいさんは。\n 下界から 創失の呪いの気配を 感じるよう:
So? How's the old timer doin', anyway? I can
still feel the curse comin' from the surface.
Is that still a bust, or what?

321028.<pc>は 女神ゼネシアから\n主神グランゼニスを 目覚めさせるため\n守護天使:
<pc> explains that Zenethia had
asked them to find the Guardian Angels
to awaken Gran Zenith!

321029.「……誓約の子らよ。\n 少しばかり 昔話をしてやろう。:
Children of the Covenant...
Let me tell you a little story from long
ago...

321030.「かつて 我 グランゼニスは\n 己を唯一絶対とする 驕れる神であったが\n …:
Once, I, Gran Zenith, was a proud god who
considered myself absolute and supreme.
...but someone managed to change that.

321031.「創造主といえど ひとりでは判断を誤る。\n ……ゆえに その者が去りし後\n:
Even as Architect, I made lapses in judgment
alone. Therefore, after that someone left,
I created two goddesses...

321032.「女神ゼネシアと 女神ルティアナ。\n ……ふたりの 我が娘を。:
The goddesses Zenethia and Lutiana...
My two daughters.

321033.「ひとつの まばゆき光は 必ず影を作る。\n されど もうひとつの光が 異なる側:
A single dazzling light will always cast a shadow. Yet, if another light shines from the other side, the shadows will be
illuminated, and the entire world will be enveloped in light.

321034.「ルティアナは ゼネシアのために。\n ゼネシアは ルティアナのために……\n:
Lutiana for Zenethia... Zenethia for
Lutiana... I commanded my daughters to
both compliment and help one another.

321035.「……ふたりの女神さまって\n まるで 勇者と盟友のようね。<pc>。:
The two goddesses are a lot like the Hero and
their ally, right <pc>?

321036.「主神の座の継承に ふたつの神具……\n 王笏と王冠が 必要なのも 愛する娘たち:
For the succession to the throne of the Almighty, two divine artifacts are needed for my beloved daughters...the crown and
the scepter. Also meaning: "Hey! You two'd better get along!"

321037.「ところがだ！ 娘たちの成長を待ってた ある日\n ジア・クト念晶体が 攻めてき:
But THEN! One day, while waiting for my daughters to grow, the Dia Kut Telecrystal attacked! Slowly, but surely, they encroached
the lands of Zeniath!

321038.「追い詰められた じいさんは もはやこれまでと\n ゼネシアを眠らせ ルティアナ:
Cornered, the old man knew his time was up.
He put Zenethia to sleep and let Lutiana
escape, unleashing the curse of unmaking...

321039.「お偉い 神さまだって\n しょせんは 人の親。\n ……自分の娘にゃ めっぽう:
Even mighty gods are still parents at the end
of the day. Pretty lenient with his own
daughters...

321040.「とうさまは 強く やさしい！\n そして ねえさまや ちいねえさま……\n み:
Father was strong and kind! He loved his
daughters...he loved everyone.

321041.「アンタら 創生のチカラの源が なんなのか\n 考えたことは あるかい？:
So, you ever wonder what the source of the
power of creation is?

321042.「ん～と……。\n すごーい神さまだけが 持ってる\n はちゃめちゃ・スペシャル:
Hmm, well... The crazy, special, amazing
power that only really amazing gods
have?

321043.「ん～ いいセンいってるけど ちと違う。\n 創生のチカラ それは……\n ずば:
Hmm! You ARE onto something, but nope.
The power of creation, that is...
It is, without question... LOVE!

321044.「考えてもみろよ？ なーんもねえ\n さっみし～い 無から 世界を生み出すなんて:
Think about it! Starting from nothin', it's
incredibly lonely creatin' a world. It's
not somethin' so easily done.

321045.「どんな世界なら 暮らしやすいだろう。\n どんな生き物がいたら 楽しいだろう…:
What makes a world comfy? What kind of beings would be fun to live with? If you're not thinkin' about these things, then good luck
creatin' life.

321046.「新たなる世界 新たなる生命への\n あふれんばかりの愛……\n それこそが 創:
The overflowing love for a new world, for new
life... THAT is the power of creation.

321047.「天地創造の 神さまなんて\n 愛情深くなきゃ やってらんネーからナァ。:
Gods of creation like those can't get too far
without showin' love, you know.

321048.「……だからこそ あの日。\n 主神グランゼニスの絶望が\n かの 創失の呪いを:
...And that is exactly why Gran Zenith's
despair gave birth to the curse of unmaking.

321049.「もー！ マギちん 話が長いよー！\n その 創失の呪いを なんとかするために\:
Hey! Maggie, that story was too long! Zenny
asked us to do something about that curse,
you know!

321050.「すまねえなあ。何万年も 神殿の中に\n 引きこもってたせいで 誰かと しゃべん:
Sorry 'bout that. I've been cooped in this place for thousands of years, so I guess I got a little too excited when I had someone to
talk to.

321051.「……短い間にしろ じいさんが\n アンタら ルティアナちゃんの眷属との接触で\:
If it is true that the old man awakened from
the contact between you and Lutiana's
family, however brief it was...

321052.「オレたち ４人の守護天使 全員が\n じいさんのトコに戻りゃ 創生のチカラが強:
If the four Guardian Angels return to the old man's place, our power of creation will get a big boost. We may be able to stop the
curse.

321053.「……だが 危うい賭けだ。\n うまく運びゃあ ゼニアスは救われるが\n 最悪の:
But...it's a risky gamble. If all goes well,
then Zeniath's saved. If all goes bad, then
our final hope's as good as gone...

321055.「創失の呪いは ゼニアスにとどまらず\n すでに 我等が世界\n アストルティア:
The curse of unmaking does not exist only
in Zeniath. It has already taken its hold on
our world of Astoltia!

321056.「もはや ゼニアスのみの 問題ではない。\n どんなわずかな可能性であろうとも\:
It is no longer a question of Zeniath alone.
No matter how slight the possibility, we
must try it.

321057.「……いいぜ 同行しよう。\n オレたち ゼニアス最後の守護天使は\n ルティア:
...Alright, we'll go together. The last
Guardian Angels of Zeniath entrust
everything to you, Children of Lutiana!

321058.「じゃあ あたしたちと\n いっしょに 来てくれるんだね。マギちん！: Oh, so you're coming with us, then?

321059.「おう まかせときな！\n いっちょ じいさんのとこへ 出発しますか！:
Yeah! Just leave it to me!
Time to go visit that old man!

321060.「来い！ ゼニアスの守護天使……\n 最後の生き残りたちよ！:
Come forth! Zeniath's Guardian Angels...
The last survivors!

321061.「……なつかしい顔ぶれだ。\n 二度と 同胞に会えぬまま 最後の日を迎えると\n:
These familiar faces... I thought I'd see my own end before seeing my comrades again, but it brings me joy to meet again
like this.

321062.「主神グランゼニス様の おひざもと以外は\n ジア・クトに滅ぼされてしまったから:
The Dia Kut destroyed everything but Gran
Zenith's territory...it's nothing short of a
miracle that we all survived.

321063.「はい。幸運にも 私たちは 生命尽きる前に\n ルティアナ様の眷属が ゼニアスに:
Yes... We are fortunate to all be here and
witness this joyous day, when Lutiana's
kin returned to Zeniath...

321064.「……ああ。今日から すべてが始まるんだ。\n みんな 長い間 ご苦労だったナ。:
Yeah... Today, everything begins anew.
Everyone's worked so hard for so long.

321065.「かつて 女神の果実を実らせ お役御免になった\n オレたち天使が ふたたび 創:
We angels once bore the fruit of the Goddess and retired from our duties. However, we were reborn again to protect this world
of Zeniath and its people.

321066.「ジア・クトが 撤退し\n ルティアナちゃんの眷属が帰ってきた 今こそ！\n 我:
Now that the Dia Kut are gone, and Lutiana's
kin have returned...it's time for us to
fulfill our final duty as Guardian Angels!

321067.「ゼニアスの 大いなる創造主\n 主神グランゼニスよ！:
O Gran Zenith!
Great Architect of Zeniath!

321068.「我ら 守護天使が宿したる 創生のチカラ\n 今こそ 御許へ お返ししよう！:
We, Guardian Angels, shall return the power
of creation we hold unto you!

321069.「さようなら ムニエカの民よ……。\n あなたたちを 心から 愛していました……:
Farewell, my people of Munieka...
I truly loved all of you...

321070.「俺には もう無理だけど……\n <cs_pchero>は ティセとまた一緒に\:
I won't be able to do it anymore, so...
<cs_pchero>, you should go to the
Cuckoo Festival with Tise, okay?

321071.「我は 守護天使 バトラエル。\n だが お前たちが呼ぶ\n トラちゃんという響:
I am Batrael, Guardian Angel.
Though...the way you called me "Traeie"...
...it wasn't so bad.

321073.「マギちん……？ みんな！？\n なんで いなくなっちゃったの……？:
Maggie, everyone, they...!
Why did they disappear...?!

321074.「天使の肉体は 創生のチカラ そのもの。\n みんな とうさまに それを返した。:
The body of an angel is the power of creation
itself. They all returned it to Father.
That is why...they disappeared.

321075.「<cs_pchero>隊長！ 起きた！\n パパゼニスさまが 起きたよっ！:
<cs_pchero>! He's awake!
Papa Zenith is awake!

321079.「女神ルティアナが創造せし 新世界\n ……その名は アストルティア。:
It is a new world created by Lutiana...
It is called Astoltia.

321080.「我らが女神は 七柱の兄弟神を 創造し\n 七柱の兄弟神たちは それぞれの眷属…:
She created the Seven Siblings, and they in
turn created their kin, the seven races...
using the power of creation.

321081.「あまたの困難 あまたの災いが 世界を襲ったが\n 七つの種族たちは みな チカ:
Many difficulties and many calamities have befallen that world, but the seven races have all joined together and overcame these
hardships together.

321082.「その要……すべての種族と 神々を束ね\n アストルティアを救いし 新世界の守り:
And the cornerstone...the guardian of that new world who united all races and gods, who has saved Astoltia...is the one who stands
here. .

321110.「とうさまに お仕えした日々\n ラキは……幸せでした。:
The days I spent serving you, Father...
Raki was happy.

321115.「……んぅ。\n なぁにぃ？ まだ 眠いよお……。:
Huh... What's going on...
I'm still so sleepy...

321119.「どうか 早まらないでくださいませ……！\n 創失の呪いの源を 消し去る方法は\:
You mustn't be so rash...! There must be some
other way to eliminate the curse of unmaking!

321121.「ふたつの世界を苦しめた 創失の呪いは\n ……完全に 消え去りました……。:
The curse of unmaking that ailed both our
worlds has completely vanished...

321122.「……けれど 引き替えに\n とこしえのゆりかご ゼニアス……\n この世界を:
But, in exchange...
The creator of the Eternal Cradle, this world
of Zeniath...has disappeared.

321123.「妹 ルティアナも亡き 今……\n どうして わたくしひとりが 生き残り\n …:
Now that even my sister Lutiana is gone...
Why am I the only left alive...the only one
left behind...?

321124.「この王笏に宿るチカラは 計り知れぬもの。\n それでも 世界をよみがえらせるに:
The power residing in this scepter is immeasurable. Yet...it is not enough to revive this world. As I am not the Almighty,
I cannot do it alone...

321126.「グランゼニスさまはね もうひとり……\n アストルティアにも いるよ！:
There's another Gran Zenith... You know,
the one in Astoltia!

321128.「ええ。さきほど 主神グランゼニスさまは\n 女神ルティアナ様の子 継承者グラン:
Yes... This Gran Zenith had said that
Lutiana's son would be heir and come
to save this world.

321129.「そして 私たちは 主神グランゼニスさまに\n 約束したのです。必ず アストルテ:
And so, we promised him. We promised that
we'd bring our Gran Zenith from Astoltia.

321130.「お教えくださいませ <cs_pchero> みなさん！\n ルティアナの子 グ:
Please, you must tell me!
Lutiana's child, Gran Zenith...is he still
safe?!

321131.「伝説だと 人間の神グランゼニスさまは\n 神話時代の戦い以来 アストルティアの:
The legends say that the human god Gran Zenith
fell asleep somewhere in Astoltia, after a
battle in the mythical age!

321132.「傷つき 滅びかけた この世界……\n ゼニアスを よみがえらせることができるの:
This world is injured and on the brink of
destruction... There is only that can revive
Zeniath, and that is the new Almighty.

321133.「<cs_pchero> みなさん。\n どうか 継承者グランゼニスを 捜し出し:
Please, all of you... You must help me to
find Gran Zenith and lead him to Zeniath.

321134.「ラキも 継承者グランゼニスを 捜したい。\n <cs_pchero>……ラキを:
Raki wants to find Gran Zenith, too.
Please take Raki to Astoltia!

321135.「わたくしからも お願いいたします。\n <cs_pchero>……。\n どう:
I humbly ask you as well, <cs_pchero>...
Please take Raki with you.

321136.「あらたなる主神の座を 継承するためには\n 父が遺した この王笏と もうひとつ:
To succeed to the throne of the Almighty, I
need this scepter along with another divine
artifact: the Crown of the Almighty...

321137.「わたくしは 主神の王冠を探します。\n あなたがたは 継承者グランゼニスを\n:
I will search for the crown. Please, I beg of
you to find Gran Zenithーour successor.

321138.「はやく 出発しよう <cs_pchero>。\n 継承者を 捜しに！:
Let us depart right away!
We must find the successor!

321139.「そう せかすものでは ありませんよ。ラキ。\n ……旅立ちの前に <cs_pc:
There is no need to rush, Raki.
Before you depart, allow me to express
my gratitude to you, <cs_pchero>.

321140.「創失の呪いの源を 断ち切り\n ゼニアスと アストルティアを\n 救ってくださ:
For severing the source of the curse, and for
saving both Zeniath and Astoltia...

321141.「……亡き 我が父\n 主神グランゼニスに代わり 感謝いたします。\n <cs_:
I express my gratitude on behalf of my late
father.

321142.「ラキ。アストルティアで\n 継承者グランゼニスを 見つけたら\n すぐに わた:
Raki. As soon as you find Gran Zenith within
Astoltia, please contact me immediately.

321143.「……これで いつでも わたくしに\n 呼びかけられます。おいたをして ポルるん:
With this, you can call on me anytime you
wish. I'll be sure not to bother Porrie or
anyone else.

321144.「……しばし お別れですね。\n <cs_pchero> メレちー ポルるん。:
<cs_pchero>, Merry, Porrie...
I suppose this is goodbye for now.

321145.「ルティアナの子 継承者グランゼニスと ともに\n あなたがたが ゼニアスに帰る:
I shall be waiting in the Grounds of the Covenant...for the day you return with Gran Zenith, Lutiana's son and our
successor...

321146.「ネーしゃま まっかせて～！！\n あたしたちが すぐに\n まごゼニスさま 見:
Wait for us, Zenny!! We'll find Other-Zenith,
I promise!!

321147.「やーっと 創失の呪い やっつけたね！\n <cs_pchero>隊長！: Finally, we beat the curse of unmaking!

321148.「まさか 主神グランゼニスさまが\n 自らを犠牲にして 呪いを消し去るなんて\n:
I never expected that Gran Zenith would
sacrifice himself to make the curse go
away, though...

321149.「その おかげで 私だって\n こうして 呪いから救われたのよね。\n もしかし:
Because of that, I was saved from it.
Could it be that Aunt Marone also...?

321150.「……そうよ！ 私 どうして忘れてたの？\n <cs_pchero>の お母さん:
Of course! How did I forget that?!
<cs_pchero>'s mother's name is
Marone!

321151.「<cs_pchero>隊長！\n すぐに アストルティアに帰って 確かめよう！:
<cs_pchero>! We gotta get back to
Astoltia and see for ourselves!

321152.<cs_pchero>たちは ラキを連れて\nはじまりの地へ戻り 調査隊のメンバ:
<cs_pchero> and co. return to the Land of
Beginnings with Raki, reporting to the others
that the source of the curse had been severed.

321153.調査隊の面々は 主神グランゼニスの死や\nラキの正体に 驚きながらも\n呪いが消:
The others were surprised at the news of Gran Zenith's death and Raki's true identity, but were overjoyed that the curse was finally
gone.

321154.創失の呪いの 解決を機に 燈火の調査隊は\nいったん 解散することとなった……。:
With the curse of unmaking now taken care
of, the Ember Explorers took a temporary
hiatus...

321156.「またも お前に 助けられたな。\n ……<cs_pchero>。:
You've once again saved my life,
<cs_pchero>.

321157.「創失……というものに 飲み込まれた後\n 私は 果てなき暗闇の中に いました。:
After that...unmaking swallowed me, I was
trapped in an endless darkness.

321158.「天も地もなき闇の中 助けを求め\n 逃げ出す方法を探して さまよえども\n 音:
In that darkness where there was nothing, I wandered around looking for help or a way to escape...but the darkness just went
on and on.

321159.「……いつしか 私は 自分が どこから来たのか\n どこへ帰ろうとしていたかを:
Eventually I forgot where I came from and
where I was going. Its as if my own heart was
swallowed by that darkness, too.

321160.「どれほどの時間が 経ったのか……\n 自分が 誰だったのかすら 忘れかけた私が:
I didn't know how much time had passed...
I almost forgot who I was, and had given
up on everything...

321161.「突然 暗闇の中に まばゆい光が差し込み\n ……光へと 必死に手を伸ばすうちに:
But suddenly, there was a blinding light piercing through that darkness... I desperately reached out for it, and it
allowed me to return home.

321162.「あふれる光に包まれた時 <cs_pchero>……\n あなたの声が 聞こえた:
When I was surrounded by that light...
I thought that I heard your voice,
<cs_pchero>.

321163.「再び こうして 親子３人で 笑いあえるのは\n あなたの おかげなのね……。\:
Once again, the three of us can laugh
together as a family again... Thank you,
<cs_pchero>...

321164.「調査に向かった世界 ゼニアスで\n 私も 身をもって 創失を体験しました。:
I experienced the unmaking firsthand, in that
world I went to explore.

321165.「創失の呪いを 受けた時……\n 自分が 真っ暗な世界へと ずぶずぶと沈んで\n:
When I was affected by the curse... It was
like sinking into a world of nothing but
pitch-black...and ceasing to exist.

321166.「もしも あなたたちが いなかったら\n あのまま 私も マローネ叔母様も\n:
If you all hadn't been there, then neither I
nor Aunt Marone would have probably come
back, right?

321167.「ああ……。無事で なによりだぞ。\n メレアーデ。お前に 何かあったら\n 亡:
Yes... I am relieved to see you safe, Mereade.
If anything were to happen to you...your
father Domineus would never forgive me.

321168.「創失の呪いは 異世界ゼニアスの創造神が\n ジア・クト念晶体の侵略を 退けるた:
The curse of unmaking was said to be created
by Zeniath's own god of creationーto repel
the Dia Kut's invasion.

321169.「全知全能の神様 本人ですら\n 制御しきれぬほどの すさまじい呪いでしたが\n:
The curse was so horrible, that not even their
Almighty could control it. But with his
death, the curse vanished.

321170.「安心して 叔父様 叔母様。\n もう二度と 誰かが 消えることはないわ。:
The both of you can rest assured. No one will
ever disappear again.

321171.「ああ。我が自慢の子 <cs_pchero>が\n またも 世界を救ってくれた。:
Yes. My <if_woman>daughter<else>son<endif> that I am so proud of...
You have saved the world again.

321172.「異世界の調査は 大変だったのでしょう？\n 当分 家で のんびりなさいな。\n:
It must have been so hard to explore another
world. Why not come home and relax for
a bit?

321173.「ダメダメ！ ネーしゃまに\n まごゼニスさまを 捜してくるって\n 約束したん:
No way! We promised Zenny that we'd find
Other-Zenith!!

321174.「ゼニアスには 新たな主神が 必要。\n ……ラキは ねえさまに 頼まれた。\n:
Zeniath needs a new Almighty. Raki was asked
by his sister to find Gran Zenith, too...

321175.「君たちは……？\n どういうことなのだ <cs_pchero>。:
And they are...?
What does this mean, <cs_pchero>?

321176.<cs_pchero>は パドレに\nアストルティアのどこかに眠る 人間の神\n:
<cs_pchero> explains to Padre that
they needed to find the human god Gran
Zenith, who sleeps somewhere in Astoltia!

321177.「……そうか。アストルティアの祖となる世界\n ゼニアスを 救うためとあらば\n:
I see... If you mean to save the ancestral
home of Astoltia, then I must do everything
I can to help you.

321178.「旧き世界からの客人よ。\n しばらく 時間をくれぬか。世界中に遺された\n グ:
Our visitors from the old world... Could you
spare some of your time? We will search
all over for the legends of Gran Zenith.

321179.「しばらくは……どれくらい？\n ゼニアスには 今 主神がいない。\n ラキは:
"Some time"...how long is that? Zeniath has
no Almighty, and Raki wants to start
searching immediately...

321180.「やみくもに 捜しても 見つからないわ。\n まずは アストルティアについて\n:
You won't be able to find much by just looking
around aimlessly. You should first learn more
about Astoltia.

321181.「そうね……ラキと ポルテちゃんは しばらく\n エテーネの村に滞在しては どう:
Well...why don't Raki and Porte stay in Ethene
Village for awhile? I'll contact Shini and let
him know.

321182.「エテーネの村って どんなとこかな？\n いいとこだったら ネーしゃまも\n 連:
What kind of place is Ethene Village, I
wonder...? If it's nice, I'd like to bring
Zenny there, too!

321183.「……ねえさまは ゼニアスを守る神。\n それに 主神の王冠を 探さねばならない:
She is the goddess who protects Zeniath...
Besides, she has to find the Crown of the
Almighty. She cannot leave.

321184.「もー。ラキってば 頭カタいよ～。\n それじゃ <cs_pchero>隊長！\:
Geez, Raki. Lighten up a bit!
Alrighty then, <cs_pchero>!
We're off to Ethene Village!

322182.<center>長きにわたる忠誠 まこと ご苦労であった\n……今 この時より:
Your long-standing loyalty is truly appreciated. I now release you from your duty as divine beast. From this day forth,
you may live free, to do as you wish.

322184.<center>我が身より出でて 我が身 深くに巣喰いし\n創失の呪いは 誓約の:
The curse of unmaking, born from deep within
me, has been defeated by the Children of
the Covenant.

322185.<center>今 この時より 創失の呪いは\nふたつの世界から 完全に消え去る:
From this moment, the curse of unmaking
shall vanish completely from both worlds.
...and my body, along with it!

322186.<center>さらばだ 愛しき子らよ\n手を取りあい 正しき道を 歩め……:
Farewell, my beloved children.
Join hands with one another, and walk the
path of righteousness...

322188.<center>……我が娘 ゼネシアよ\nこたび…こそ ゼニアスを…守れ……:
Zenethia, my daughter...
It is now...your duty...to protect Zeniath...

322189.<center>じゃあな アンタら……あとは うまくやれよ\n超絶イケてる オレ:
See ya, you guys... Make sure you do good from
here out. My only regret...was that I couldn't
show ya my truly awesome self...

322191.<center>どれほど 帰りを 待ちわびたことだろう\n愛しき娘ルティアナ……:
How I have longed for the return of my beloved
daughter Lutiana...and her Children of the
Covenant to the Eternal Cradle...

322192.<center>聞かせよ 新たなる天地が いかなるものか\n新たなる生命 新たな:
Tell me... What is this new realm like? How
does my daughter govern this new world...
this new life?

322193.<center>……なるほど 誓約の子らが 無事 ゼニアスに\n帰還できたのは:
I see... It is thanks to you, <cs_pchero>,
that the Children of the Covenant have
returned safely to Zeniath...

322194.<center>我が娘 女神ルティアナは\nその旅立ちの日に こう 誓ってくれた:
Lutiana, my daughter, swore to me on that day
of her departure.

322195.<center>父 主神グランゼニスより 受け継ぎし\n創生のチカラにて 私は:
With the power of creation that I inherited
from my father, Gran Zenith, I will create
a new world amidst the unfamiliar sky...

322196.<center>そして いつの日か 新たなるグランゼニス……\n父の名を継ぐ神と:
And thus, I vow that I will return one day with a new Gran Zenith...a god that inherits my father's name....and will save my sister
Zenethia and Zeniath...

322209.<center>ようこそ 私の愛し子よ……\n誓約の園まで よくぞ 無事に たど:
Welcome, my beloved children...
You have safely arrived in the Grounds
of the Covenant.

322211.<center>誓約を守り この地に還り来たりし 愛し子のため\nとこしえのゆり:
Having sworn to return to this land for the sake of my beloved children, before embarking from this Eternal CradleーI leave these
words...

322212.<center>誓約の園の 頂へ至り\n神殿で待つ 守護天使マギエルに 会うがよ:
Reach the apex of the Grounds and meet Magiel,
Guardian Angel, who awaits your arrival
inside the temple.

322213.<center>……そうして ジア・クトに 損なわれたる\nこの世界 ゼニアスと:
Thus, I wish for Zeniath and Zenethia, my
sister, to be saved from the corruption
inflicted by the Dia Kut...

322214.<center>しばらく……休めば 回復します……。\nどうか その間に……\n:
I will rest awhile...to recover my strength...
Meanwhile, please...you must...find the
Guardian Angels...

325231.「心配をかけましたね <cs_pchero>……。:
I'm sorry to have made you worry,
<cs_pchero>...

325232.守護天使を捜しおえた <pc>たちは\nメレアーデの提案で\nテントの外で 打ち:
After their search for the Guardian Angels,
<pc> and co. meet outside
the tent at Mereade's suggestion...

325233.なんと 小島に ふしぎな建物が現れている。\n光の橋は どうやら ふしぎな建物の:
A mysterious structure appears on the islet.
It appears the bridge continues on to
this structure...

325234.<pc>たちは 光の橋を渡って\nふしぎな建物へ向かった……。:
<pc> and co. cross the bridge to
the mysterious structure...

325877.<center>それこそが ルティアナの誓約……！: That is the covenant of Lutiana...!

325878.<center>ルティアナの命は 新世界にて 尽きたようだが\n娘に代わり 新た:
It appears that Lutiana's life had ended in this new world... But in her place, the new god and her successor, Gran Zenith...
He will surely save the Eternal Cradle...

325879.<center>アストルティアの グランゼニスが\nゼニアスを訪れる……\nその:
I look forward to the day when the Gran Zenith
of Astoltia may visit Zeniath...

325880.「……ああ。必ず連れてくると 約束しよう。: Yes. I promise that I will bring him here.

325881.<center>娘よ……\nそなたは ふたつの心を 持つようだな:
My child...
It appears that you possess two hearts.

325882.<center>そなたの もうひとつの心は\n必ずや そなたの助けと なるだろう:
You other heart will surely come to your aid,
just like Lutiana and Zenethia...

325883.<center>……誓約の子らよ\nそなたらのアストルティアのためにも\n創失の:
Children of the Covenant... For the sake of all those of Astoltia, the curse of unmaking must be completely
eradicated.

325885.<center>これなるは 我が身より生まれ\nゼニアスと アストルティアを苦し:
This was born from my own being...
The source of the curse of unmaking that
afflicts both Zeniath and Astoltia...

325886.<center>誓約の子らよ こやつと 戦うのだ:
Children of the Covenant. You must fight this
being.

325887.<center>ふたつの世界が 救われる道は\nすべての創失の呪い その源を断つ:
The only way our two worlds may be saved is to
sever the curse at its source... Follow
Lutiana's covenant, and defeat this creature.

325888.「またも 邪魔をするつもりか？: Are you going to get in our way again?

325889.「たとえ 創失の呪いの源であろうとも\n 主の写し身に ラキは 牙をむけられない:
Even if it is the source of the curse, Raki
cannot turn on a copy of the master.

325890.「……頼む <cs_pchero>。\n おまえの手で とうさまに巣喰いし 呪い:
Please, <cs_pchero>...
Defeat the source of the curse that festers
within our worlds.

325892.「……クッ。さすがは 呪いの親玉だ。\n ここまで…か……:
Hmph... As expected as the holder of...the
curse... Is... this it...?

325894.<center>創失の呪いの源よ 我がもとへ 戻れ……！: Source of the curse! Return to me now...!

325895.「えっ……？ なになに なにこれぇ！？\n どうしよ <cs_pchero>隊長:
Huh...? W-w-w-what is this?!
What do we do, <cs_pchero>?!

325896.<center>おのれ……！\n守護天使たちに授けし 創生のチカラを\n取り戻し:
Accursed...! Even the power of creation given
by the Guardian Angels is no match...!

325898.「とうさまが愛した ゼニアスと\n ちいねえさまの子らを 守る……\n それが:
To protect Father's beloved people,
and my sister's children...
That is Raki's convenant!
